description.value: You know the secrets of moving in your @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Favored Terrain]{Favored Terrain}. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to move within your favored terrain, such as Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Balance]{Balance} on ice, Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Swim]{Swim} in rough water, Acrobatics checks to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Fly]{Fly} in windy conditions, and so forth.
